description: This file contains utility functions for a Streamlit-based web application, including message handling, agent restart, sidebar widget display, and tool call visualization.

methods.name: add_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the Streamlit session state, initializing the messages list if necessary.

methods.name: restart_agent
methods.description: Resets the agent state and clears chat history, then triggers a rerun of the Streamlit app.

methods.name: sidebar_widget
methods.description: Displays a sidebar with sample user queries and a button to restart the agent.

methods.name: display_tool_calls
methods.description: Displays a list of tool call results in an expandable format within a Streamlit container.
